description: Window Cleaning Services, including labour, supervision, transportation, tools, material, and equipment; for Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), located at Confederation Building, 229 Wellington Street, Justice Building, 249 Wellington Street and CBC Building, 181 Queen Street, Ottawa, Ontario.It is mandatory that the Bidder or a representative of the Bidder visit the work site. Arrangements have been made for the site visit to be held on February 28th, 2024 at 10:30am EST at 229 Wellington Street, Ottawa, ON, in the lobby.   Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than 2:00pm EST on February 23rd, 2024 to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) and date of birth of the person who will attend.   It is mandatory that bidders provide and wear the following for the mandatory site visit: Safety boots and Hard hat.
full_summary:
**Notice of Tender**
# EJ196-241453: Window Cleaning Services - Confederation Heights

**Reference No.**: WS4406540713-Doc4410423082

## Project Details

* **Solicitation No.**: WS4406540713
* **Publication Date**: February 1, 2024
* **Closing Date**: March 21, 2024 (14:00:00 EST)
* **Amendment No.**: 4
* **Date of Amendment**: March 18, 2024

## Service Requirements

* The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals for Window Cleaning Services, including all labour, supervision, transportation, tools, materials, and equipment.
* The scope of work includes cleaning windows at the Confederation Building, Justice Building, and CBC Building in Ottawa, Ontario.

## Bid Submission

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be received on or before March 21, 2024, at 14:00:00 EST.
* Late bids will not be accepted.

## Mandatory Site Visit

* Bidders are required to attend a mandatory site visit on February 28, 2024, at 10:30:00 EST at 229 Wellington Street, Ottawa, ON.
* Bidders must confirm their attendance and provide the names and dates of birth of the individuals attending by February 23, 2024, at 14:00:00 EST.
* Bidders must wear safety boots and hard hats during the site visit.

## Trade Agreements

* This tender is subject to the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Contact Information

* For more information, please contact: Caroline Richard, SPAC/PSPC, caroline.richard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
* The Notice URL is: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18679488?extsite=MTg2Nzk0ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. 

I made no changes to the original data source, only formatted it properly and rephrased for better clarity and readability
